<@U01U201MTQF> not sure if you've solved this yet or moved forward but tags don't automatically mix between blog instances so that shouldn't be an issue.
Yeah you are right, they do have to update it. In my experience, every user clicks the update button because HubSpot prompts them to do so, so you almost have to assume it does it automatically

I don't think you can. You need to make a new section, hide the old one on mobile devices, and show the new one.

Another alternative is to utilize a template partial so that you can change the background image with the  class name
